name: ReconAll
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
ReconAll, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.freesurfer.preprocess, interface: ReconAll).
Uses recon-all to generate surfaces and parcellations of structural data from anatomical images of a subject.

inputs.name: Flair file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Convert flair image to orig directory.

inputs.name: T1 files
inputs.description: A list of items which are a pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Name of t1 file to process.

inputs.name: T2 file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Convert t2 image to orig directory.

inputs.name: Big ventricles
inputs.description: A boolean. For use in subjects with enlarged ventricles.

inputs.name: Brainstem
inputs.description: A boolean. Segment brainstem structures.

inputs.name: Directive
inputs.description: 'all' or 'autorecon1' or 'autorecon2' or 'autorecon2-volonly' or 'autorecon2-perhemi' or 'autorecon2-inflate1' or 'autorecon2-cp' or 'autorecon2-wm' or 'autorecon3' or 'autorecon3-t2pial' or 'autorecon-pial' or 'autorecon-hemi' or 'localgi' or 'qcache'. Process directive.

inputs.name: Expert
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Set parameters using expert file.

inputs.name: Flags
inputs.description: A list of items which are a string. Additional parameters.

inputs.name: Hemi
inputs.description: 'lh' or 'rh'. Hemisphere to process.

inputs.name: Hippocampal subfields t1
inputs.description: A boolean. Segment hippocampal subfields using input t1 scan.

inputs.name: Hippocampal subfields t2
inputs.description: A tuple of the form: (a pathlike object or string representing an existing file, a string). Segment hippocampal subfields using t2 scan, identified by id (may be combined with hippocampal_subfields_t1).

inputs.name: Hires
inputs.description: A boolean. Conform to minimum voxel size (for voxels < 1mm).

inputs.name: Mprage
inputs.description: A boolean. Assume scan parameters are mgh mp-rage protocol, which produces darker gray matter.

inputs.name: Openmp
inputs.description: An integer. Number of processors to use in parallel.

inputs.name: Parallel
inputs.description: A boolean. Enable parallel execution.

inputs.name: Subject id
inputs.description: A string. Subject name.

inputs.name: Subjects dir
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing directory. Path to subjects directory.

inputs.name: Talairach
inputs.description: A string. Flags to pass to talairach commands.

inputs.name: Use flair
inputs.description: A boolean. Use flair image to refine the pial surface.

inputs.name: Use t2
inputs.description: A boolean. Use t2 image to refine the pial surface.

inputs.name: Xopts
inputs.description: 'use' or 'clean' or 'overwrite'. Use, delete or overwrite existing expert options file.

output-files.name: Subjects dir
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing directory. Freesurfer subjects directory.
